aethel_movedex.name: Aurora Dust
aethel_movedex.effect: The user scatters a shimmering, hypnotic dust. On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target's Vitality and Insight are both lowered by 1.

aethel_movedex.name: Ghostly Splash
aethel_movedex.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target's Dexterity is lowered by 1.

aethel_movedex.name: Glacier Forge
aethel_movedex.effect: Hits all adjacent opponents. On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target is Frozen.

aethel_movedex.name: Earthen Stomp
aethel_movedex.effect: Hits all adjacent opponents. On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target Flinches.

aethel_movedex.name: Mountain's Call
aethel_movedex.effect: The user and all its allies raise their Strength and Vitality by 1 for the rest of the scene.

aethel_movedex.name: Aurora Borealis
aethel_movedex.effect: Hits all adjacent opponents. On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target is either Burned or Paralyzed (user's choice).

aethel_movedex.name: Psychic Gambit
aethel_movedex.effect: The user and the target swap all of their current status conditions and stat changes.

aethel_movedex.name: Trickster's Blade
aethel_movedex.effect: On a successful hit, the user copies the last move used by the target. The copied move replaces Trickster's Blade for the rest of the scene.

aethel_movedex.name: Permafrost Prison
aethel_movedex.effect: Hits all Pokémon on the field. On a successful hit, the target is permanently Frozen. This move has a very high chance of missing.

aethel_movedex.name: World-Root Anchor
aethel_movedex.effect: Hits all non-Grass type Pokémon on the field. On a successful hit, targets are trapped and cannot switch out or flee for the rest of the scene.
